text: [Ej pajomʙar] Jaqinan, jahudijon va kasonero, ki sirk varzidand, dusmantarini mardum nisʙat ʙa mu'minon xohi joft va nazdiktarin duston ʙa mu'minonro kasone xohi joft, ki megujand: "Mo masehi hastem". In ʙa xotiri on ast, ki mijoni eson kasison va rohiʙon [-i haqparast] hastand va [niz] az on rust, ki takaʙʙur namevarzand
